name: Leashed Lesion
description: The Leashed Lesion is a large aberration characterized by a chaotic appearance and a symbiotic nature, featuring a special recess on its back for tethering other creatures.
memorable: It has a unique ability to tether a creature, draining its health to heal itself while grappling the target.
goals: To drain health from foes while sustaining itself and controlling its tethered target.
relations: Often encountered alongside other aberrations or as a minion to darker powers.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic landscapes where it can employ its blindsight.
strengths: Possesses damage resistance to necrotic damage and can regain health based on the necrotic damage dealt.
weaknesses: Limited cognitive abilities with a low Intelligence score, which may restrict strategic planning.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack consisting of a Bite dealing piercing and necrotic damage, along with two Claw attacks for slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Draining Burst allows it to deal area damage while healing itself and its tethered target.
senses: Has blindsight with a range of 120 feet, allowing it to detect hidden creatures without sight.
skills: Limited perception skills with a passive perception of 9.
additional_information: Can attach a symbiotic Life Tether to gain health from the tethered creature's suffering.
The creature can only maintain one Life Tether at a time, adding tactical choices.
It can unleash a potent area effect with its Draining Burst, enhancing its survivability.
Both the lesion and the tethered creature can detach from the Life Tether as a bonus action.
test_queries: creature that drains health and heals itself
large chaotic monster with necrotic resistance
monster with area necrotic damage attack
